import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import InputGroup from '../components/InputGroup'; import RowDetails from '../components/RowDetails'; import axios from 'axios'; function Rooms() { const[rooms,setrooms] =useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('api/rooms') .then(res=>{ setrooms(res.data) }) }, []) return (

fullname nic phone email check_in check_out no_of_rooms totalmember payment Actions
); } export default Rooms;
